SEARCH
Package fr.univnantes.web.websocket

Class WebSocketSessionManager

java.lang.Object
fr.univnantes.web.websocket.WebSocketSessionManager
public class WebSocketSessionManager extends Object
This class is used to manage the WebSocket sessions. It is used to store the document id and the user id of a session. It is also used to check if a session is already connected.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
